name: OffRoad Driving Prado Car
description:
Are you ready for thrill of OffRoad and show your crazy driving skills by drive real 4x4 land Cruiser offroad game. Fasten your seat belt, start racing and complete level. You have to reach on all checkpoint on time and make a new record. You can drive uphill and downhill in real off road environment. In hill tracks there are sharp cuts and curly road to thrill the race.

Features:
• Real Suv jeep hill drive 4x4 simulator
• Real addiction of offroad driving.
• Real sim of driving with offroad cruiser.
• Furious and thrilling sound effects of turbo engine.
